title: 3 and Out - Packers Problems, Out on Wentz, Darnold Resurrection, Carr vs. Big Ben, NFC East, Cardinals Doubts, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Packers Problems, Out on Wentz, Darnold Resurrection, Carr vs. Big Ben, NFC East, Cardinals Doubts, Mailbag
description:
John discusses the Packers Monday Night Football win over the Lions, and why it doesn't convince him that Green Bay has recovered from a drama filled offseason. He also looks at the continued injury problems plaguing Carson Wentz, why the Colts season could be over before it starts, why he's impressed with the early turnaround for Sam Darnold in Carolina, and what the Steelers/Raiders matchup revealed about Big Ben and Derek Carr. He also looks ahead to the upcoming Eagles/Cowboys matchup, its NFC East implications, why he's not convinced the Cardinals can be a serious playoff threat, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
